abilities.name: Time Travel
abilities.effect: If Celebi Star would be Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may flip a coin. If heads, Celebi Star is not Knocked Out, discard all cards attached to Celebi Star, and put Celebi Star on the bottom of your deck.

attacks.name: Leaf Shade
attacks.effect: Count the amount of Energy attached to Celebi Star. Put that many damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
